hero.title: Saving starts with calculation.
hero.description: Our smart bot instantly calculates your electricity tariffs, saving you time and money.

about.title: About Our Electricity Tariff Bot
about.description1: Our bot is designed to simplify the process of calculating electricity costs based on your local tariffs.
about.description2: With a user-friendly interface and accurate calculations, it helps you save time and make informed decisions about your energy usage.

contact.title: Get in Touch with Our Bot
contact.description: Have questions or need help? Contact us or connect directly with our Telegram bot for instant tariff calculations.
